oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Durbán Segarra, Marcos
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This dissertation deals with the elaboration of a six-lesson learning unit designed in order to respond to the needs observed in a bilingual 1st year ESO group during the placement period for the Máster En Profesorado de E.S.O. Especialidad de Lenguas Extranjeras: Inglés.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Universidad de Zaragoza; Departamento de Filología Inglesa y Alemana; Área de Filología Inglesa
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Máster Universitario en Profesorado de Educación Secundaria Obligatoria, Bachillerato, Formación Profesional y Enseñanza de Idiomas, Artísticas y Deportivas
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: “Travelling together”: A learning unit based on current communicative approaches as a way of redressing some of the negative aspects of traditional methodologies
“Travelling together”: A learning unit based on current communicative approaches as a way of redressing some of the negative aspects of traditional methodologies
